DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study determine effect dietary weight-loss , exercise training , combination physical function overweight obese adult knee osteoarthritis ( OA ) . In secondary analysis , effect weight-loss and/or exercise OA progression , self-reported pain inflammation examine . In post-trial analysis , effect dietary weight-loss total mortality determine .
DOC.brief_title: The Arthritis , Diet , Activity Promotion Trial
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 60 year . BMI ≥ 28 kg/m2 . Knee pain day month . Sedentary lifestyle pattern ( < 20 min exercise per week last 6 month ) Selfreported difficulty least one following : walk 1/4 mile , climb stair , kneel , bending , stoop , shopping , lift , selfcare . Radiographic evidence grade 13 knee osteoarthritis . Serious medical condition precludes safe participation exercise heart disease ( angina , congestive heart failure ) , severe hypertension , COPD , renal liver disease , insulindependent diabetes . Minimental state exam score < 24 . Inability walk without cane . Reported alcohol consumption > 14 drinks/week . Inability complete protocol . ST segment depression . Participation another research study .
